tier.item: (280) Lai tu mcies lingvistiku!
PTC ­ you ­ study ­ linguistics
The ethical dative supports this reading like a modal PTC. It is not at all obligatory. Therefore
THURMAIER (1989, 39ff) in fact suggests analysing it as a PTC grammaticalised from the
pronoun.
306 3. The Syntax and Semantics of Questions
"If only you will study linguistics!" (sperative)
"You shall study linguistics!" (jussive)
